data.title: Strategy CEO Hints Bitcoin Sales May Loom as Shares Sink
data.description: Concerns are rising that Strategy Inc. soon may be forced to sell some of its roughly $56 billion cryptocurrency haul if token prices continue to fall, leading its shares to wobble in pre-market trading.
data.keywords: STRATEGY INC,Bitcoin,Chief Executive Officer,Cryptocurrency,Phong Le,Valuation,New York,Software,Michael J Saylor,C-suite,crypto,business,cybersecurity
